definition: imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Experiments with imago and larva locust images is segmented.
sentences.chinese: 實驗對成蟲與幼蟲圖像均進行分割。

sentences.english: The adult likes to lay eggs in the exocuticle of the receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 成蟲喜產卵於巳開放之花朵的花托外表皮內。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the responses of housefly adults to different foods.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定家蠅成蟲對不同食物氣味的反應。

sentences.english: The adult Medfly is slightly smaller than a common housefly and is very colorful.
sentences.chinese: 地中海實蠅成蟲個體比普通家蠅略小，但色彩美麗。

sentences.english: Contents of most elements except K and Mg in the adult female body and honeydew were significantly elevated.
sentences.chinese: 雌成蟲體內和蜜露中元素含量呈正相關。

sentences.english: Adults bored 4-6 shoots in total during the shoot feeding.
sentences.chinese: 在此期間，每頭成蟲可以蛀食4～6個枝梢。

sentences.english: The fecundity of an adult is very great (the highest reaches 1701 eggs).
sentences.chinese: 成蟲繁殖力強，最高產卵量可達1701粒。

sentences.english: The predation and spatial heterogeneity on Harmonia axyridis adult to Myzus persicae were determined.
sentences.chinese: 測定異色瓢蟲成蟲對桃蚜的捕食功能和空間異質性。

sentences.english: It suggests that there are some antigens common to the metacercaria and adult worm of Paragonimus westermani.
sentences.chinese: 衛氏並殖吸蟲的囊蚴和成蟲之間可能存在着共同抗原。

sentences.english: Aim To improve the collecting rate of the adult worms of Trichobiharzia.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲提高毛畢吸蟲成蟲的收集率。

sentences.english: Rats and cats were fed with metacercariae from fish to receive adult worms.
sentences.chinese: 將魚體內分離的囊蚴分別感染大鼠和家貓均獲得成蟲。

sentences.english: The artificially infected dogs were sacrificed 55 d after infection to receive adult worms.
sentences.chinese: 用分離自溪蟹的並殖吸蟲囊蚴人工感染家犬獲取成蟲。

sentences.english: The extracts had evident oviposition deterrence to the adults of Plutella xylostella.
sentences.chinese: 黃荊提取物對小菜蛾成蟲產卵有明顯的忌避作用。

sentences.english: Adult worms lodge in the lymphatic system and disrupt the immune system.
sentences.chinese: 絲蟲成蟲寄生在患者淋巴系統，破壞人體的免疫功能。

sentences.english: The sex ratio also changed with environmental temperature.
sentences.chinese: 成蟲性比隨環境溫度變化而變化。

sentences.english: The spines of adult worms appear to be single shape with morphological variation among geographical isolates.
sentences.chinese: 成蟲皮棘屬單生型，不同地理株之間存在一定差異。

definition: giant Amazon snail (Ampullaria gigas spix), that has devastated rice paddies in China since its introduction in the 1980s
to break out of an eggshell/to molt/to remove the husk/to shell
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
